name: Gate 01 — DIMKUR · KA · SAG-USH
description: From the Measures of Inanna series (Volume I). Gate 01 is the Crown Gate — the first severing, the first surrender. Here, Inanna releases the uppermost claim of identity: the crown that once defined her standing. The triad DIMKUR · KA · SAG-USH marks the loosening of authority, the opening of the head, and the offering of the self beyond hierarchy. The plate captures the quiet gravity of that moment — the gate where descent truly begins.
